attributes.name: Interactive Terminal Spawned via Python v100.0.0
attributes.description: Identifies when a terminal (tty) is spawned via Python. Attackers may upgrade a simple reverse shell to a fully interactive tty after obtaining initial access to a host.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and
  process.name:python* and
  process.args:("import pty; pty.spawn(\"/bin/sh\")" or
                "import pty; pty.spawn(\"/bin/dash\")" or
                "import pty; pty.spawn(\"/bin/bash\")")
